product_name: UCO Tetra Lantern + Flashlight + USB Charging Station
long_description: Rechargeable and highly water-resistant, this 3-in-1 lantern, flashlight and USB charger sheds 170-lumen light and charges your phone or GPS, keeping you connected and well-lit wherever you camp.
short_description: Rechargeable and highly water-resistant, this 3-in-1 lantern, flashlight and USB charger sheds 170-lumen light and charges your phone or GPS, keeping you connected and well-lit wherever you camp.
